page.title: 17HOUSING SEWAGE WORKS.
page.content: The sewage works for this area are next to Westport Lake,and by the side of the Trent and Mersey Canal. In the sewage works there is a Press House which controls the works.There are tanks were the sewage goes,and is broken down and dispersed.It only takes two men to operate the works,and they have a canteen and an office.The man in charge is named Mr James,he is my father.We live in a house next to the works,and there is a lot of land around us.We have got hens and a goat,as well as other pets like a dog,cats and ferrets.Although we are close to the middle of Tunstall,it is more like being in the country. In 8 years the sewage works will close,and my father is going to own the land.
